Having joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business, Somoe is requesting a loan of KES 15,000 to expand her business, purchase palm leaves, sacks of rice, sugar and yeast for her bakery. She dreams of becoming a big supplier in the future.

loans.use: to expand her business, purchase palm leaves, sacks of rice, sugar and yeast for her bakery.

loans.name: Manuel Mesias

texts.es:
Manuel Mesias tiene 29 años, es soltero vive  con  los padres  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar, no tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa propia.

Manuel se considera como una persona honesta y trabajadora, le gusta festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Manuel Mesias is 29 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. He has no children.

The members of the Communal Bank “Cooperativa Patrón San Miguel” (St. Michael’s Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Manuel is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. His supplies are purchased in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. He sells his goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially to access what he needs to increase production. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to have a house of his own.

Manuel is considered to be an honest and hardworking person. He enjoys celebrating the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Bety Benedicta

texts.es:
Bety de 32 años, es una mujer trabajadora  que tiene un negocio de venta de comidas en su casa para poder ayudar en los gastos a su esposo ya que él es cerrajero. 

En la actualidad trabaja desde muy temprano preparando la comida en su casa para vender los almuerzos a sus clientes. Trabaja desde las 05h00am hasta las 13h00pm todos los días. Vende desayunos, almuerzos.  Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio de venta de comida por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar pescados, arroz y otros víveres para hacer comidas que satisfagan a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Bety, age 32, is a hardworking woman who has a business selling food from her home. This allows her to help her husband, a locksmith, with the household expenses.

At the moment, she begins preparing food very early at her home so that she can sell lunches to her customers. Bety works every day from 5am to 1pm. She sells breakfast and lunch.

Bety has many aspirations for her food business, so she is requesting a loan to buy fish, rice, and other ingredients used in preparing the meals that will satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to purchase fish, rice, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina vive en la hermosa ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, en el barrio el Socorro donde tiene un negocio llamado “Festejarte” dedicado a la organización de fiestas infantiles, negocio que le ha servido para apoyar la gestión de su hogar conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 3 a 7 años; Ella inició con un trampolín que ubicaba en los parques de barrios, gradualmente empezó a alquilar esta infraestructura y fue comprando juegos infantiles que adicionó y que hoy ofrece el servicio en las fiestas dirigidas a niños. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que recibe de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará juegos de jardín para alquilar e invertirá  en volantes promocionales  para dar a conocer su negocio. Su sueño es lograr tener una casa propia  y está haciendo todos los esfuerzos en familia para lograrlo, así como llevar a que sus hijos disfruten de bienestar y principalmente que tengan una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Luz Marina lives in the neighborhood of Socorro in the beautiful city of Cartagena de Indias. She has a business called “Festejarte” which organizes children’s parties. This business has helped to support her household, which consists of her husband and three children who range in age from 3 to 7.

She started with a trampoline that she brought to the neighborhood parks. Luz gradually began renting equipment and then bought additional children’s games. Today she offers party services designed specifically for children. This Kiva loan is the first loan she has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the funds to buy kindergarten games to rent out and invest in promotional leaflets to advertise her business.

Her dreams are to have her own home and devote all of her efforts for her family so that her children can experience well-being and receive a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase kindergarten games and invest in promotional leaflets.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in the Nakulabye neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has one child who is not yet in school.  Rose has a business of selling used shoes.  She has been in this business for seven years, and she works seven days out of every week. Rose sells her products at the market, by means of retail.    

Rose has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of used shoes.    She generates additional income through selling passion juice. The main business challenges for Rose include defaulters and the rainy season, which hinders her customers from reaching her. 

Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start importing shoes herself, and also to buy a plot of land and build her own rental rooms.   She lives in a home that she rents, where she doesn't have access to electricity but does have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent.

loans.use: to buy more bales of secondhand shoes.

loans.name: Gertrudis Patricia

texts.es:
Gertrudis, es originaria de León ,tiene 40 años de edad , es madre de 4 hijos  de 18,16,12 y 4 años de edad , ella es comerciante , se dedica a vender tortilla y frijoles .Ella inicio a los 35 años de edad pues con contaba con muchas opciones de trabajo y tenia 4 hijos a quienes mantener ,ya que no aprendió ninguna carrera solo llego hasta sexto grado de primaria pues sus padres no tenían como pagar sus estudios. En vista de la necesidad que había fue que se puso a hacer tortilla y coser frijoles para vender antes trabajaba como domestica pero ya después no siguió por la situación  económica, así ha venido luchando poco a poco por ganarse la vida y llevar el alimento diario a sus hijos. Su hija mayor después de la escuela la ayuda a elaborar tortillas.
Ella solicito el préstamo para  comprar materia prima para trabajar como maíz y leña. Con esta inversión podrá adquirir mas material de trabajo para producir mas, aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos. Tiene como meta próxima hacerles mejoras de infraestructura a su negocio pues realmente las necesita.
texts.en:
Gertrudis is a native of León. She is 40 years old and the mother of four children (ages 18, 16, 12, and 4). Gertrudis is a merchant who sells tortillas and beans. She started this business when she was 35 since she had many options to work and four children to support. Gertrudis does not have a degree and only completed school through the sixth grade because her parents could not pay for her studies.

As a result of her family’s needs, Gertrudis began preparing tortillas and beans to sell. She previously worked as a housekeeper, but she was not able to continue because of her financial situation. Gertrudis gradually strives to earn a living and provide for the daily needs of her children. Her oldest daughter helps her with preparing tortillas when she comes home from school.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies for her work, such as corn and firewood. With this investment, she will be able to acquire more of the materials she uses in her work so that she can increase production. This will help improve her sales and generate more income. Her next goal is to make needed improvements to the infrastructure of her business.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loans.name: Marcos Ramiro

texts.es:
Marcos Ramiro tiene 52 años, es casado vive  con la esposa y con los hijos  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar tiene uno  hijo de 16 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Marcos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es educar al hijo y comprar terrenos.

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Marcos Ramiro is 52 years old, married, and lives with his wife and child in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. He has a 16-year-old son.

The members of the Communal Bank “Cooperativa Patrón San Miguel” (St. Michael’s Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Marcos is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. His supplies are purchased in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. He sells his goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Marcos is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially to access what he needs to increase production. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dreams are to provide his son with an education and to buy more land.

He enjoys playing sports and celebrating the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Hadjah

texts.en:
Hadjah lives in the Makerere neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has two children, both of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members (her old parents).    Hadjah has a business of selling charcoal.  She has been in this business for seven years and she works seven days out of every week. She sells her products at the market, by means of retail.    

Hadjah has requested a loan of 1,500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal.     She generates additional income through rental rooms. Her main business challenges include transportation and the rainy season, which hinders her customers from reaching her.  

Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a delivery van and to build more rental rooms.   She lives in a home that she owns where she has access to electricity but not to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Joseph S.k.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you the teachers of the SLMB Primary School Upper, situated in Mile Ninety One, a small town in the Tonkolili district in northern Sierra Leone. They are requesting a loan of 7,200,000 SLL. With the help of this loan, some of these teachers will invest in businesses, while others will pay school fees for their children, and so on. At the end of each month, the school’s bursar is directly responsible for repaying SMT on these borrowers’ behalf. 

Joseph is a teacher at the school and the leader of this group. The 48-year-old has been in the teaching profession for twenty-three years now. A native of Mile Ninety One town, Joseph is married and has four children. Joseph has requested a loan of 2,700,000 SLL in order to pay school fees for his children. 

(Attached to this photo are snapshots of Mohamed and Mamusu, borrowers who were not able to be present for the group photo).

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Blanca Dorila

texts.es:
Blanca Dorila tiene 70 años, es casada vive  con el esposo y con un hijos de 17 años en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Blanca se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar la educacion a su hijo para que sea un profesional.

se considera un apersona alegre y solidaria.
texts.en:
Blanca Dorila is 70 years old, married, and lives with her husband and a 17-year-old son in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province.

The members of the Communal Bank “Cooperativa Patrón San Miguel” (St. Michael’s Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Blanca is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. Her supplies are bought in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. She sells her goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Blanca is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help her financially to access what she needs to increase production. Among the challenges she faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. Her dream is to provide an education for her son so that he can become a professional.

Blanca is considered to be a cheerful and supportive person.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II”, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo en edad escolar.  La señora cuenta con estudios secundarios.
Susana es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora  al Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  solicitará un préstamo por la suma de  S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados vacunos,  ovinos y porcinos.

Con este dinero, más el capital con el que dispone, comprará una vaca.  Ella trabaja junto con su esposo.
Su sueño es tener más capital para mejorar el ganado y así mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es  la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Susana is a member of the Communal Bank “Hermanas de Choquetanca II” which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, married, and has a son who is in school. Sra. Susana has a high school education.

She is a new member who recently joined Manuela Ramos. Susana is requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 PEN and will invest the money in her business. She buys and sells cows, sheep, and pigs.

With this money, she will have more capital to buy a cow. She and her husband work together. Her dream is to have more capital so that she can improve her livestock and generate more income. What she enjoys about the Communal Bank is the convenience of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Akouele

texts.fr: Revendeuse ambulante des produits de premières nécessités (spaguetti, riz…) Akouélé  âgée de 33ans est mariée à un tailleur  et mère de deux enfants. Cette activité qu’elle a commencée en 2008 lui permet de ramener la croûte journalière  de sa famille car elle tient énormément à son rôle de mère au foyer. Toute son activité est basée au pays.
texts.en: Akouélé is a 33 year-old mother of two who is married to a tailor. She conducts door-to-door sales of staple foods (spaghetti, rice etc). She entered this trade in 2008, and the money that it generates enables her to see to her family's needs - in her eyes this is fundamental to her role as a mother. All of her business is generated in and around her area.

loans.use: to purchase staple food products (spaghetti, rice etc)

loans.name: Klever Antonio

texts.es:
Klever Antonio tiene 27 años, es soltero vive  con los padres  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar, no tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Klever Antonio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es llegar a tener casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte, festejar las fiestas del carnaval y estar con la familia que es muy unidad.
texts.en:
Klever Antonio is 27 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. He has no children.

The members of the Communal Bank “Cooperativa Patrón San Miguel” (St. Michael’s Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Klever Antonio is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. His supplies are purchased in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. He sells his goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Klever Antonio is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially to access what he needs to increase production. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to have a house of his own.

He enjoys playing sports, celebrating the Carnival festivities, and being part of a very close family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Muniru

texts.en:
This is 26-year-old Miniru.  He is married and has two children, aged 6 and 2. In 2005, Miniru established his provisions business. He began his business because he wanted to have more income to provide a livelihood for his family. Working seven days a week and thirteen hours a day, he earns about $210 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Miniru requires a loan in order to buy milk, sugar, margarine, an additional carton of sweets, a carton of Tiger batteries, a carton of Bama mayonnaise and a carton of cheese. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately $47. In the future, Miniru plans to get a bigger shop and to educate his children.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, margarine, sweets, batteries, mayonnaise and cheese.

loans.name: Deivis

texts.es: Deivis es un joven de 29 años que vive con su cónyuge y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 16 años y 4 meses  en Ciudad Bicentenario, macroproyecto objeto de intervención de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo en su ejercicio misional  de construir comunidades auto sostenibles.  Desde allí Deivis  ofrece sus servicios como técnico en pulimento de vehículos, actividad que inició cuando buscando ingresos para su hogar,  decidió ofrecer sus servicios de lavado de  vehículos por  principales avenidas de la ciudad, pero como Deivis es un joven de muchas aspiraciones logró dar otro  matiz , una vez  realizó estudios de pulimiento y mantenimiento externo de vehículos, logrando su título como técnico en esta actividad, en la que se desempeña con mucho esmero y sueña con hacerla crecer, porque más adelante su meta es tener un local propio para aumentar su reconocimiento, ofreciendo servicios más efectivos a sus clientes y con ello lograr aumentar sus ingresos, con tal de fomentar el bienestar de su familia y ofrecerle una educación de calidad a  sus hijos. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo  con él comprará materias primas para la preparación de productos de limpieza y cera para el pulimiento de vehículos. Su mayor desafío es atender a sus clientes sin tener  un puesto fijo, por eso todos los días trabaja con el fin de ahorrar y lograr un espacio bien organizado donde desarrollar su actividad.
texts.en:
Deivis is a young man who is 29 years of age. He lives with his wife and their two children (ages 16 and 4 months) in Ciudad Bicentenario, a large-scale housing and intervention project undertaken by Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. The mission of this project is to build self-sustaining communities.

In this community, Deivis offers car wash services. He started this business because he needed a way to earn household income. Deivis decided to offer his services to vehicles that travel along the main avenues of the city. Being a young man with many aspirations started to give him more purpose. As soon he completed courses in polishing and maintaining vehicle exteriors, he became certified as a technician to work in this type of business. His skill is demonstrated through the great care he takes in making his business grow. Going forward his goal is to have his own location where can he can attract more business, offer more effective services to his customers, and generate more income to help him provide for the welfare of his family and pay for a quality education for his children.

This Kiva loan is his first with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Deivis will use the funds to buy materials for preparing cleaning products and car wax for polishing vehicles. His greatest challenge is attending to his customers without having an established location. For this reason, he works every day so that he can save toward acquiring an organized space where he can develop his business.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning materials and car wax.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PEROLNIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jose; el tiene 50 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de granos secos como trigo,maíz,cebada y moraya,el socio vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el socio también tiene una tierra de cultivo donde siembra maíz y también lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de granos secos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar granos secos como maíz, trigo, cebada y moraya al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "Perolniyoc". The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco.
The member is Jose. He is 50 years old, lives with his partner, and has 1 son. He combines his daily chores with running a business buying and selling dried grains like wheat, corn, barley and dried potatoes. He sells his goods in the Urubamba market from 9:00am until 6:00pm. He also has some land where he grows corn and he also sells at the fairs. He wants to grow his business buying and selling dried goods. The member is requesting a loan to buy dried grains like corn, wheat, barley, and dried potatoes in bulk. 
He is happy to get the loan and promises to make the repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy dried grains such as corn, wheat, and dried potatoes in bulk

loans.name: Kofi

texts.fr: Transitaire au Port Autonome de Lomé(PAL) depuis 2003, Kofi est marié et père de 03 enfants.il opère dans la Zone portuaire pour les besoins des clients qui le  sollicite pour le dédouanement de leurs  marchandises. Ce  crédit dans notre institution lui servira à acheter une moto pour lui faciliter les navettes effectuées  dans  son  travail et rendre de surcroît plus efficace ce qu’il fait  déjà bien.
texts.en: Koffi is a married father of three who has worked as a freight broker at Lomé's port since 2003. His work at the port entails assisting customers to pass their goods through customs.  This loan would enable him to purchase a motorbike which would enable him to reach his customers' ferries more easily and efficiently.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pigs, leaves, bags, tomatoes, cornmeal, onions and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, batteries, mints, soaps, etc. in large quantities to add to his business.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PEROLNIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elisa; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de cabina de internet y también tiene fotocopiadora, la socia también es profesora del nivel inicial en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m y en las tardes atiende la cabina de internet, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de servicio de internet. La socia solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de la computadoras, para comprar papales y recargar las maquinas impresoras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Perolniyoc". The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.
The member is Elisa. She is 41 years old, single, and has one daughter. She combines her daily chores with a business running an internet kiosk and photocopier. She is also a first grade teacher in the Ollantaytambo district. She works from 8:00am until 1:00pm and in the afternoons she staffs her internet kisosk. She wants to grow her internet business. She is requesting a loan for the maintenance of the computers, to buy paper, and to recharge the printer cartridges. 
The member is happy to have the loan and promises to make the repayments on time.

loans.use: to maintain the computers, to buy paper, and to recharger the printer cartridges.

loans.name: Mikafumawu

texts.fr: Agée de 56ans, cette est veuve de 04 enfants. Elle opère dans la restauration depuis 2002. Elle vend de façon ambulante après achat des ingrédients au marché d’Akodesséwa. Ce premier cycle lui servira à acheter les produits de restauration (riz, huile, mais, tomate…) pour tout d’abord louer un local pour satisfaire plus sa demande croissante et prendre en charge ses 04 enfants.
texts.en: Mme Mikafumawu is a 56 year-old widow and a mother of four children. She has run a catering operation since 2002. She sources food ingredients from the Akodesséwa market and then sells her wares via door-to-door sales. This first loan will enable her to purchase food items (rice, oil, corn, tomatoes etc) and to rent a small outlet from which she will be able to better meet her customers' demands. The money that she aims to generate will enable her to look after her the needs of her four children.

loans.use: to purchase food items

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es:
Mariana de 30 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene un depósito de bebidas en una parte de su casa. Trabaja repartiendo bebidas a las tiendas y distribuyéndolas a los diferentes clientes que le solicitan. 

En la actualidad trabaja desde las 06h00am repartiendo las botellas hasta las 22h00pm que se las da a su último comprador. Las botellas las vende por docena y por unidad a un valor muy económico para el cliente. Vende colas, guitte, agua.  Quiere seguir con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo mas bebidas como botellas de colas, agua con gas etc. Su sueño es tener un carro para repartir con más agilidad las botellas a los clientes.
texts.en:
Mariana, 30, is a hard-working woman who warehouses soft drinks in part of her house.  She delivers them to stores and to different customers who request them.

She works from 6 am delivering the bottles until 10 pm when she sees her last customer.  She sells the bottles by the dozen and each unit is economical for her customers.  She sells colas, mineral water, (Guite brand) and water.  She would like to continue with her business and that’s why she is requesting the loan to purchase more drinks such as bottles of cola, mineral water, etc.  Her dream is to have a car so that it will be much easier to make the deliveries .

loans.use: To purchase bottled drinks to sell

loans.name: Luis Edalio

texts.es:
Luis Edalio tiene 48 años, es casado vive  con la esposa y con el hijo  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar la educacion a su hijo para que sea un profesional.

Le gusta caminar por el campo.
texts.en:
Luis Edalio is 48, married, and lives with his wife and son in Chillanes Canton in Bolívar Province. He is a member of the Patrón San Miguel Cooperativa Communal Bank, located in the village of Pailaloma, 60 minutes from the Cooperativa office for Chillanes Canton. The 13 members of this bank do agricultural work, cultivating corn, potatoes, and wheat. 

Luis plants corn, potatoes, and wheat. He buys his products in Chillanes and in San Pablo at the end of each month, and sells them at the Sunday market in Chillanes. He requests the loan to purchase supplies for his crops, as well as fertilizers and manure. The support from this loan will help him meet his financial needs and increase his production, as well as face challenges such as insect infestations, illnesses, and the vagaries of the weather. 

His dream is to provide for the education of his son so he can be a professional. He enjoys walking through the countryside.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops, as well as fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PEROLNIYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sara; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes que trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y también en sus ratos libres la socia se dedica a realizar trabajos de salón de belleza como cortar el cabello o hacer teñidos, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante  a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también mejorar el servicio de salón de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y golosinas para la tienda de abarrotes.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sara belongs to the Perolniyoc Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Sara, age 37, has a life partner and five children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business, a grocery store.  She works from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  In her free time she does beautician work like cutting hair and dyeing hair.  Through these small businesses she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand her grocery store business, and she wants to improve her beauty salon service.  She is requesting the loan to buy products like rice, sugar, noodles, oil, and sweets for her grocery store.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy products like rice, sugar, noodles, oil, and sweets for her grocery store.

loans.name: Nomanyo Abla Sitsofe

texts.fr: Résidant à Akodesséwa (un quartier  du pays), Mme Abla est  célibataire. Elle se donne à l’activité de vente de sous-vêtement  de femmes et enfants depuis 2004 de façon ambulante  après avoir acheté au Grand Marché de Lomé. Ce premier prêt  lui servira à acheter  les articles afin de vendre pour louer un local afin de mieux se positionner pour satisfaire ses nombreuses clientes  et préparer mieux sa future vie maritale.
texts.en: A resident of Akodesséwa (an area of the country), Mrs. Abla is single.  She has dedicated herself to the business of selling women's and children's undergarments as a travelling salesperson since 2004, after having bought her products at the Big Market of Lomé.  This first loan will serve to purchase products in order to sell them, so that she can rent a place to better position herself to meet the needs of her numerous customers and prepare for her future marital life.

loans.use: to purchase women's and children's undergarments.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, está casada y tres hijos.  Estudió educación secundaria.
Sonia trabaja Junto a su esposo, ellos se dedican a la compra  y venta de ganados como ovinos vacunos.  Su esposo también se dedica a la pesquería, negocio al que se dedica paralelamente para generar otros ingresos.
La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde  hace un ciclo, con su primer préstamo solicitado que fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, incrementará al capital de su negocio para comprar una vaca lechera.  Como casi todos en Puno, Sonia  también se dedican a la chacra, con esto ella puede sustentar gastos menores del hogar.
Su sueño es tener capital propio para tener ganados mejorados.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el trabajo en grupo.
En la foto la podemos ver junto a su hija menor.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the "Hermanas de Choquetanca II" Communal Bank, which is located in the Ilave district of El Collao province in Puno department. She is 25 years old, married, and has three children. She has a secondary level education. 

Sonia works, together with her husband, buying and selling animals such as sheep and cattle.  Her husband is also a fisherman, a business he runs on the side to generate additional income. 

Sonia has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement Organization for one loan cycle. She invested her first loan of 500 soles (PEN) in her business. With this new loan of 1000 soles (PEN), she will increase her working capital by purchasing a milk cow. 

Like almost everyone in Puno, Sonia also farms, and with this she can cover minor household expenses. Her dream is to have her own capital so she can improve her animals. Her favorite part of the Communal Bank is working in a group. 

The photo shows Sonia with her younger daughter.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha Cecilia tiene 39 años, es soltera  vive  con los padres en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Martha se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es algun dia comprar ganado para dedicarse a la cianza y venta de estos.

Le gustar pasar tiempo con la familia.
texts.en:
Martha Cecilia is 39 years old, single and lives with her parents in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Patrón San Miguel” (Patron Saint Michael) communal bank’s members are located in Pailaloma Recinto, 60 minutes from the office.  It belongs to Chillanes Canton.  This communal bank has 13 members dedicated to corn, potato and wheat farming.

Martha is a corn, potato and wheat farmer.  She buys her supplies in Chillanes and in San Pablo at the end of each month and her sales take place during the Sunday market in Chillanes.

She is asking for the loan to buy some farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase production.  The challenges she faces are infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  Her dream is to buy livestock some day to go into animal raising.

She enjoys spending time with her family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Mireya Del Socorro

texts.es: Mireya Del Socorro de 40 años, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos que trabajan de manera independiente. Su negocio consiste elaboración y venta de nacatamales y repostería recuerda que inició desde pequeña por sus padres, pero al poco tiempo notó que este negocio tenía mucha demanda, desde luego que siguió con esta actividad. Actualmente  su negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos económicos, además tiene más de 22 años con este negocio ya que siempre esta brindado un buen servicio y esto les gusta a sus clientes. Con el crédito que solicita comprara cerdos y hojas, masa, tomate, cebolla, bolsas y otras cosas.
texts.en:
Mireya Del Socorro, 40, is a single mother of two children who work independently.  Her business consists in the manufacturing of Nacatamales (Nicaraguan style tamales) and pastry.  She remembers that she started out while still little with her parents but gradually noted that this business was in high demand so she continued with it.  

Currently, the business is her main source of income.  She’s had the business for 22 years because she’s always provided good service and her customers like this.  She will use the requested loan to buy pigs, banana leaves, “masa” (dough) or tamales, tomatoes, onions, bags and other things.

loans.use: to buy pigs, banana leaves, masa for tamales, tomatoes, onions, bags and other things.

loans.name: Orfa Raquel

texts.es:
Orfa Raquel  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II”, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 17 años de edad, es conviviente y no tiene hijos.  Tiene estudios secundarios (incompleto).
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde  hace un ciclo, su primer préstamo solicitado fue  por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de animales domésticos como ovino, vacuno y porcino.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, comprará una vaquita, en este negocio le ayuda su esposo quien  trabaja en construcción civil en la ciudad de Arequipa y la ayuda cuando llega a Puno.
Su sueño es mejorar su casa y tener una mejor vivienda para el futuro.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunión donde comparte con las demás socias.
texts.en:
Orfa Raquel is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 17 years old, lives with her partner and has no children; she has a high school education but didn’t graduate.

Orfa Raquel has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for a year, her first loan was S/. 500.00 nuevos soles and was used in her business, buying and selling domestic animals like sheep, cattle and pigs.

With this new loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles she will buy a cow, her business helps her husband who works in construction in the city of Arequipa, he helps her when he arrives to Puno.

Orfa Raquel’s dream is to improve her house and have a better home for the future.

What she enjoys about her Communal Bank is the meetings that she attends with the other members.

loans.use: buy a cow.

loans.name: Elizabeth Eliana

texts.es:
Elizabeth Eliana tiene 20 años, es soltera vive  con los padres  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Elizabeth se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es llegar a terminar la carrera universitaria.

Se considera una persona alegre y solidaria.
texts.en:
Elizabeth Eliana is 20 years old, single and lives with her parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolívar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Elizabeth is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Elizabeth needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Elizabeth’s dream is to finish her university education.

She considers herself to be a loyal and happy-go-lucky person.

loans.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Karina Patricia

texts.es:
Karina Patricia tiene 25 años, es soltera vive  con los padres en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar no tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Karina se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ser una profesiona y comprar un carro para los padres.

Le gusta escuchar musica.
texts.en:
Karina Patricia is 25 years old, single, has no children and lives with her parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolívar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Karina is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Karina needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Karina’s dream is to be a professional and buy her parents a car.

Karina enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Success Club Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Success Club” group. They are small scale businesspeople based in Magburaka, a town in northern Sierra Leone. The leader of this group is 28-year-old Osman. Osman sells toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc. 

This is not the first time that Osman and his group members have benefited from a loan from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of a previous Kiva loan, they were able to expand their businesses both in size and quality. Having repaid their last loan successfully, they are again requesting for a new loan of 800,000 SLL for each in the group in order to further expand their respective businesses, make more profit and consequently improve on their standard of living. 

Leader of the group, Osman, will use his share of the loan to buy toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc. in large quantity to add to his business.

loans.use: to buy toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc. in large quantity to add to his business

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
Ofelia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II”, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.  Tiene grado de instrucción primaria (incompleta).
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, ella requiere de un préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio de compra y venta de ganado vacuno, ovino y porcino.  Con éste préstamo comprará cuatro unidades de ovejitas.  Ella trabaja junto con su esposo.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando en este negocio ya que le resulta rentable.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del pago.
En la foto se muestra cargando a su bebé que tiene pocas semanas de nacido.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 26 years old, married and has 2 children; she has some primary school education but never completed it.

Mrs. Ofelia is a new member that has recently become a part of the Movimiento Manuela Ramos, she needs a loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles. The money will be used in her business, buying and selling cattle, sheep and pigs, she will buy four little sheep. Ofelia works with her husband.

Her dream is to keep working on her business since it is profitable.

What Ofelia enjoys about her Communal Bank is the ease of her payments.

She is shown in the picture carrying her baby that is a few weeks old.

loans.use: buy four litte sheep.

loans.name: Inti Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INTI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella es casado y tiene 43 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. crianza D. aves, ella cría pollos, los hace engordar y crecer y luego lo venD. en lugares como Izcuchaca,la socia también se dedica al negocio D. venta D. chompas, ella teje las chompas y luego lo venD. en forma ambulatoria, por medio D. estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. crianza D. aves y negocio D. venta D. chompas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y también para comprar lanas para que tejer las chompas.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio D. restaurant, venta D. verduras, negocio D. venta D. chocolates, negocio D. venta D. artesania.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "INTI". This bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

One of the members is Hilda. She is married, is 43 years old, and has three children. She works with her business of raising birds. She raises chickens. She fattens them and makes them grow. Then, she sells them to places like Izcuchaca. She also has a business where she sells sweaters. She weaves the sweaters and then sells them as a street vendor. By means of these businesses she helps her children get ahead. She wants to grow and improve her businesses of bird raising and sweater selling. She is asking for this loan to buy chickens and also to buy wool to weave the sweaters.

The other members have a restaurant business, sell vegetables, have a chocolate business, and sell crafts.

Hilda is thankful to those who form part of this dream through this means. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loans.use: to buy chickens and wool to weave sweaters.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “GRAN RENOVACION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nilda; ella tiene 56 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza, ella venD. lápices labiales, perfumes, cremas entre otros productos D. belleza, ella venD. en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones y público en general, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos D. belleza al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "GRAN RENOVACION" [Great Renovation]. This bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

The partner is Nilda. She is 56 years old, is married, and has two children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling beauty products. She sells lipstick, perfume, and creams among other beauty products. She sells in an independent way, taking her products to different places such as institutions and the public in general. She wants to improve and enlarge the beauty products sales business. She is asking for this loan to buy wholesale beauty products.

She is happy because of the loan, and she promises to follow through with the payments of her dues.

loans.use: to buy wholesale beauty products.

loans.name: Primero De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PRIMERO DE MAYO”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac; en la provincia de Urubamba, Departamento del Cusco.

La  socia Eufracia 38 años de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos;  La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar; la socia trabaja ayudando a su conyugue en la carpintería que él tiene, la socia apoya a su pareja en cuanto a los acabados ella barniza, pule los trabajos ya terminados, también se encarga de lijar, poner perillas, accesorios a los diferentes muebles. La socia también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores así como aves de corral (gallinas, pollos), cuyes y chanchitos. La socia vende los animalitos cuando estos alcanzan su periodo de madures. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores y así incrementar sus ventas.

Los socios se dedican a la crianza de animales menores; a la venta de helados, a la atención de una tienda de abarrotes, a la venta de comidas, a la venta de verduras.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito que le otorgarán y de este modo podrá  mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "PRIMERO DE MAYO" [First of May]. The partner lives in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco.

The member is Eufracia. She is 38 years old. She lives with her partner and has four children. She alternates her activities of the home. She works helping her spouse in the carpentry workshop that he has. She supports her partner by varnishing and polishing jobs that are already finished. She also deals with sanding and putting knobs and accessories on different forms of furniture. She also raises young animals like farm-yard birds (chickens), guinea pigs, and pigs. She sells the small animals when they reach maturity. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of young animals and in this way increase her sales.

The partners raise young animals, sell ice-cream, have a grocery store, sell food, and sell vegetables.

Eufracia values and and is infinitely grateful for the loan that they will grant her. In this way she will be able to improve her quality of life. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loans.use: to buy young animals and increase their sales.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II”, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.  Nos cuenta que sólo puedo estudiar hasta 3ro de secundaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde  hace un ciclo, con su primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio compra y venta de animales domésticos como ovino, vacuno y porcinos.  Como casi todas las pobladoras de Puno, también se dedica la chacra.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, incrementará al capital de su negocio para comprar  cinco unidades de ovejas.  En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo, también cuenta que su esposo trabaja en la pesca. 
Su sueño es tener ganados mejorados y así tener mayores ganancias.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunión y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Nilda is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 24 years old, married and has two children; she says that she was only able to study up to her junior year of high school.

Nilda has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for a year, her first loan was S/. 500.00 nuevos soles and was used in her business, buying and selling domestic animals like sheep, cattle and pigs. As most of the inhabitants of Puno she works in a small farm.

With this new loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles she will increase her work capital to buy five sheep. Nilda works with her husband who also works as a fisherman.

Nilda’s dream is to have better cattle to have more profits.

What she enjoys about her Communal Bank is the meetings and the ease of getting the loan.

loans.use: buy 5 sheep.

loans.name: Rubi Magly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “GRAN RENOVACION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rubi Magly; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agencia de turismo y también trabaja en agencia de marketing, la socia por medio de este negocio y trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de agencia de internet. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar la agencia para el mantenimiento de la computadora y para comprar un escritorio.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Rubi Magly, 29, belongs to the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

She is partnered and has 2 children.  She operates two businesses: a travel agency and a marketing company.  She supports her two children with the income from the businesses and now she wants to expand her travel business by adding an Internet site.  She will use this loan to repair her computer and buy a desk.  

She is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to repair her computer and buy a desk for an Internet-based travel business.

loans.name: Santos Nasario

texts.es: Don Santos de 50 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 hijos estudiando en la universidad, su esposa labora como maestra de primaria y le apoya con los gastos del hogar.  Santos labora para Alcaldia de Juigalpa como policia municipal desde hace 1 año. Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda cambiando una parte del techo, al mismo tiempo desea comprar gaseosas y otros productos para su pequeño negocio que tiene cerca de su trabajo.  Su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Don Santos, 50, is married and has 2 children, both in college.  His wife works and they share household expenses.  Santos has worked as a policeman for the town of Juigalpa for 1 year.  He is appying for this, his first loan, so that he can replace part of the roof on his house.  He will also buy soft drinks and other products for a small retail business that he operates near his workplace.  His greatest wish is to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to repair the roof on his house and to buy merchandise for his small retail business.

loans.name: Jairo Vinicio

texts.es:
Jairo Vinico tiene 21 años, es soltero vive  con los padres  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar, no tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Jairo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener terrenos propios y ganado.

Le gusta trabajar en la tierra.
texts.en:
Jairo Vinico is 21 years old, single, has no children and lives with his parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolívar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Jairo is a farmer; he grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. He buys his products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

He needs the loan to buy materials for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help Jairo economically to meet his needs and increase his production as he fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects his crops.

Jairo's dream is to have his own plots of land and cattle.

He enjoys working the fields.

loans.use: buy materials for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es socia del  Banco Comunal “Hermanas de Choquetanca II”, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar.  La señora estudio la secundaria.
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  ella requiere de un préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio de compra y venta de ganados vacunos y ovinos, comprará una vaca en la localidad de Ilave.  En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo e hijos, también cuenta que hacen chacra como: papa, quinua y chuño.
Su sueño es tener ganados mejorados y así generar mayores ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es  la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 41 years old, married and has three children of school age, she finished high school.

Mrs. María is a new member that has recently become a part of the Movimiento Manuela Ramos, she needs a loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles. The money will be used in her business of buying and selling cattle, sheep and pigs, she will buy a cow in the Llave area. María works with her husband and children since they also harvest potatoes, quinoa and “chuño” (a type of potato).

Her dream is to have better cattle to have more profits.

What Ofelia enjoys about her Communal Bank is the ease of her payments.

loans.use: buy a cow.

loans.name: Dezi

texts.en:
Dezi lives in the Nakulabye neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is single and has 5 children, three of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members (grandchildren).

Dezi has a food stall business. She has been in this business for 5 years and she works 7 days out of every week. Dezi sells her products at the market, by means of retail. Dezi has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of tomatoes, onions, oranges, bunches of bananas and a sack of cassava.

She also generates additional income through rental rooms.The main business challenges for Dezi include rainy weather which hinders her customers to reach out to her and transportation.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start going to farmers directly and build more rental rooms.

Dezi lives in a home that she owns. She has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of tomatoes, onions, oranges, cassava and bunches of bananas

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina tienen es muy conocida en su comunidad, ya que es la dueña de “Uñas Lemani”  un salón de belleza ubicado en Mollejones de Pérez Zeledón. 
Hace 5 años Carolina abrió su propio negocio, un salón de Belleza  que le ha permito superarse como madre y como microempresaria. La demanda es alta y necesita ampliar su negocio, es por eso que necesita un préstamo ₡594 000 (quinientos noventa y cuatro mil colones) para la compra de los materiales necesarios para ampliar su local y acondicionarlo con la herramientas de belleza necesarios. Carolina es muy positiva y asegura que podrá reembolsar su crédito sin ningún problema que el negocio crecerá aun mas, así como sus ingresos. 
Ella es socia de la empresa de Crédito Comunal Bancruce, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Carolina is very well known in her community since she is the owner of “Lemani Nails” a beauty salon located in Mollejones de Pérez Zeledón.
5 years ago, Carolina opened her own business, a beauty salon, that has allowed her to get ahead as a mother and a microentrepeneur. The demand for her services is high and she needs to expand her business and that is why she needs a loan of ₡594 000 (five hundred ninety-four thousand colones) to buy the materials necessary to expand her place and to set it up with the beauty tools necessary. Carolina is very positive and is sure that she will be able to pay back the loan without any problems since the business will grow as will her profits.
Carolina is a member of the Bancruce Communal Bank, one of the 110 member companies of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: To buy beauty tools and construction materials.

loans.name: Yolanda Esmeralda

texts.es:
Yolanda Esmeralda tiene 48 años, es soltera vive  con una  hija de 12 años  en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Yolanda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar lo que la hija necesite sobre todo la educacion.

Ser una persona alegre.
texts.en:
Yolanda Esmeralda is 48 years old, single and lives with her 12 year old daughter in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolívar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Yolanda is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Yolanda needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Yolanda’s dream is to give her daughter everything she needs, especially and education.

She considers herself to be a happy person.

loans.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Dewin Miguel

texts.es: Dewin  de 32 años tiene una tienda en el municipio de Malambo, ubicado a 15  minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla; allí  vive con su cónyuge y su hijo de 6 años de edad, familia que es su motivación para dirigir todos sus esfuerzos de trabajo y lograr su bienestar. Dewin es un educador de profesión, que adquirió la experiencia de negocio en la casa de sus padres y él desde muy niño observó cómo ellos  sacaron adelante a su familia mediante este trabajo. Por eso hace tres años recibió una liquidación y no dudó en emprender su propia aventura, que hoy está convertida en una tienda que constituye  importantes ingresos para su hogar. Este negocio es administrado por su esposa en las mañanas y por él mismo en la tarde, porque trabaja en un colegio el otro medio tiempo. Su meta es apoyar su crecimiento para  cada día ganar más rentabilidad y muy seguramente lo logrará, porque es un hombre de familia, muy organizado y trabajador;   su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará víveres, papelería, y en general artículos de miscelánea pues desea fortalecer también,  su punto de ventas como miscelánea y con ello aprovecharía el mercado ya cautivo del que goza su tienda. .
texts.en: Dewin is 32 years old, he has a store in the Malambo municipality, some 15 minutes from the city of Barranquilla. He lives with his partner and 6 year old son; they are his motivation to give his all to his work and to obtain their wellbeing. Dewin is a teacher by profession that got business experience is his fathers’ home and since he was a boy he saw how they got their family ahead through their work. This is why three years ago when he received his severance pay he didn’t think twice about setting up his own business which is now a very important part of his family’s income. The business is managed by his wife in the mornings and the afternoons by himself since he works in a school in the mornings. Dewin’s goal is to support his growth to be more profitable each day and surely he will achieve it since he is a family man, very organized and hardworking. His Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo is his first, he will buy supplies, stationary, and miscellaneous general articles since he wants to stock his store and make good use of the market that his store has cornered.

loans.use: buy supplies, stationary, and miscellaneous general articles.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es: Sandra Maria posee un negocio que es venta de recargas telefónicas y alquiler de triciclos. Tiene más de 6 años en este negocio, ha buscado como mantener a sus 2 hijos este negocio lo aprendió por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos del hogar, es una persona muy luchadora y disfruta de su actividad. Solicita este financiamiento para realizarle mejoras a triciclo comprar llantas, asientos, forros y recargas telefónicas. El desea con mejorar su capital y proporcionar más ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Sandra María has a business selling telephone recharge time cards and leasing tricycles.  She’s been in business 6 years.  She has sought ways to support her two children.  She learned this business because of the need she had to meet household expenses.  She’s a very tenacious person who enjoys her work.

She is asking for this loan to do some improvements on the tricycle: to buy tires, seats and seat covers.  She will also buy more telephone recharge cards.  She hopes to improve her capital and provide more income for her home.

loans.use: to buy tires, seats and seat covers for her tricycle and to buy telephone time cards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken, chicken gizzards, beef, rice, flour, eggs, beans, soft drinks and charcoal.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “GRAN RENOVACION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Consuelo; ella tiene 54 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos, ella vende casacas, chompas y polos, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando a lugares como Brasil, la socia también trabaja como profesora en el sector educación, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como zapatos y ropa al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Consuelo, 54, belongs to the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

She is partnered and has 4 children.  She operates a clothing sales business.  Among other things, she sells shoes, coats, sweaters and shirts, working as far afield as Brazil.  She also works as a tutor, but the business provides her with an extra income so that she can better provide for her children.  She wants to expand the business so she's applying for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of merchandise that she will resell.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy wholesales supplies of merchandise for her clothing business.

loans.name: Hector Belisario

texts.es:
Hector Belisario tiene 65 años, es casado vive  con la esposa en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  COOPERATIVA Patrón San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de maíz, papas y trigo.

Hector se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la producción. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa y tener mas terrenos para seguir sembrando.

Le gustar ser una persona responsable.
texts.en:
Héctor Belisario is 65 years old, married and lives with his wife in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Patrón San Miguel” (Patron Saint Michael) communal bank is located in Palialoma Recinto, 60 minutes from the office.  It belongs to Chillanes Canton.  The communal bank has 13 members who are corn, potato and wheat farmers.

Héctor is a corn, potato and wheat farmer.  He buys his supplies in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and his sales take place at the Sunday market in Chillanes.

He is asking for this loan to buy farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs and increase production.  The challenges he faces are infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  His dream is to buy a house and to have more land to farm.

He likes to be a responsible person.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Kangni

texts.fr: Retraité de 56ans, Mr Kangni est marié à une revendeuse et ils ont en charge 02 enfants. C’est un homme dynamique malgré son âge et veut assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille. Il a un pressing « LOVER PRESSING » depuis 2009. Ce second prêt lui servira à acheter des nouveaux matériels de travail afin de satisfaire au mieux ses clients.
texts.en: A 56-year-old retired man, Mr. Kangni is married to a retailer, and the two have two children in their care.  He is a dynamic man despite his age, and he wants to ensure a bright future for his family.  He has run a dry-cleaning business called "Lover Drycleaning" since 2009.  This second loan will allow him to purchase new working materials in order to meet the needs of his customers.

loans.use: to purchase new materials for his dry-cleaning business

loans.name: Bethel 4, 5 & 8 Group

texts.en:
Rafaela is one of the members of the group Bethel 4, 5 & 8. This group is located in one of the rural communities surrounding San Pedro D. Macoris. They are 15 borrowers who are businessmen and businesswomen. Rafaela makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their 4 children. Her business is based on underwear sales from her house and by walking to sell. 

Rafaela is excited to be taking her 8th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 4 years. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing dozens of pairs of underwear for men, women and kids, and also swimwear. She will use her profits to invest in her business and to save.

Her group is located in San Pedro D. Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and the sugarcane industry. The main economic activities here are a free traD. zone and a cement factory.

loans.use: to buy underwear

loans.name: Crisologo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “GRAN RENOVACION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Crisologo; el tiene 59 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, el vende en forma independiente como casacas, ropas interiores, chompas y pantalones llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor como pantalones, casacas y ropas interiores.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Crisologo, 59, is a member of the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

He is married and has 4 children.  He operates a clothing sales business.  Among other things, he sells coats, underwear, sweaters and pants, offering his merchandise everywhere he can find buyers.  He wants to expand and improve his business so he's applying for a loan to buy wholesale supplies of merchandise such as pants, coats and underwear that he will then resell.

Sr. Crisologo is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies of clothing for his retail business.

loans.name: Kossiwa Félicité

texts.fr: Mme Kossiwa  est mariée à un Revendeuse de produits de denrées alimentaires, des médicaments et du sodabi (boisson locale faite à base de palmier à huile très  appréciée chez nous) depuis 2000 et mariée à transitaire et mère de 04 enfants. Elle achète au Grand marché de Lomé et revend à son domicile. Elle sollicite ce second prêt pour renforcer son activité.
texts.en: Mrs. Kossiwa  has been a retailer of food products, medicines and sodabi (a local drink made from palm-tree oil that is well-loved in her homeland) since 2000 and is married to a forwarding agent and is the mother of 4 children.  She buys at the Big Market of Lomé and re-sells from her home.  She is asking for a second loan to strengthen her business.
